pkgmetadata.longdescription: schoolbus=========A python library to guess whether an email is from an academic institution,heavily based on the swot ruby gem: https://github.com/leereilly/swot.Pull requests for missing institutions (see data.py) are welcome.Available on PyPI: pip install schoolbusUsage-----.. code:: python>>> schoolbus.is_academic('coryli@mit.edu')True>>> schoolbus.is_academic('josh@benchling.com')False>>> schoolbus.school_names('vineetg@mit.edu')[u'Massachusetts Institute of Technology']>>> schoolbus.school_names('sajith@scicu.org')[u'Claflin College', u'Allen University', u'Morris College']
